page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: {We thank the following for their help: Mrs.E.Dixon,Mrs.E.M.Spratt,Mr.I.August P.C.Finlayson,Mr.F.Mellor, Mr.T.J.Robson,Mr.J.W.Robson,Mr.J.Gray, Mr.F.G.Vickers,The Mason Family, The Tears Family,The Keenan Family, The Rev.M.Sadgrove & Dr.C.Shrimpton. {The following pupils all aged 10-11 {contributed in some way to the {compilation of this information: A.Wealleans,A.Ainsworth,R.Keenan, J.Taylor,T.Oates,J.Meakin,A.Gray, P.Wintrip,L.Giacopazzi,D.Barella, I.Plenderleith,R.Fieldsend,L.Hope, S.McGurk,D.Pringle,A.Hopper,N.Wilson, N.Thompson,A.Baker,C.Cooper,S.Holmes, K.McMullen,C.Straughan,H.Marshall, B.Paxton,D.Wilson,R.Newton,N.Casson, J.Burlton,M.Frater,T.Brown,D.Gray, S.Renner,J.Kennedy,J.Spowart,S.Ogle, J.Rule,L.Catlow,P.Mason,I.Weatheritt, N.Stafford.
